$view
service in module ui.router.state

Description

Dependencies

  • $templateFactory
  • $rootScope

Methods

  • load(name, options)

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    namestring

    name

    optionsobject

    option object.

Events

  • $viewContentLoading

    Fired once the view begins loading, before the DOM is rendered.

    Type:

    broadcast

    Target:

    root scope
    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    eventObject

    Event object.

    viewConfigObject

    The view config properties (template, controller, etc).

    Example

    $scope.$on('$viewContentLoading',
function(event, viewConfig){
    // Access to all the view config properties.
    // and one special property 'targetView'
    // viewConfig.targetView
});
